alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Piscataquis, central Aroostook and north central Penobscot Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 444 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clayton Lake, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clayton Lake, Masardis, Oxbow, Russel Crossing, South Branch Pond, Churchill Dam, Moosehorn Crossing, Baxter State Park, northwestern Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument, Grand Lake Seboeis, Round Pond, Grand Lake Matagamon and Garfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook
